, CASE WHEN PLAN_NUM IN (0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS PLAN
, CASE WHEN PLAN_NUM IN (#{dto.plan_num}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS PLAN
, CASE WHEN MONEY_OPTION_NUM IN (0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS MONEY_OPTION
, CASE WHEN MONEY_OPTION_NUM IN (#{dto.money_option_num}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS MONEY_OPTION

, CASE WHEN TRAFFIC_NUM IN (0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS TRAFFIC
, CASE WHEN TRAFFIC_NUM IN (#{dto.traffic_num}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS TRAFFIC
, CASE WHEN CYCLE_NUM IN (0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS CYCLE
, CASE WHEN CYCLE_NUM IN (#{dto.cycle_num}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS CYCLE
, CASE WHEN PACE_NUM IN (0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS PACE
, CASE WHEN PACE_NUM IN (#{dto.pace_num}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS PACE
, CASE WHEN DESTI_TYPE_NUM IN (0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DESTI_TYPE
, CASE WHEN DESTI_TYPE_NUM IN (#{dto.desti_type_num}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DESTI_TYPE
, CASE WHEN TO_DO_NUM IN (0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS TO_DO
, CASE WHEN TO_DO_NUM IN (#{dto.to_do_num}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS TO_DO
, CASE WHEN TO_SEE_NUM IN (0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS TO_SEE

, CASE WHEN MEAL_COUNT_NUM IN (0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS MEAL_COUNT

, CASE WHEN SUPPLY_NUM IN (0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS SUPPLY
, CASE WHEN SUPPLY_NUM IN (#{dto.supply_num}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS SUPPLY
, CASE WHEN PHOTO_NUM IN (0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS PHOTO
, CASE WHEN PHOTO_NUM IN (#{dto.photo_num}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS PHOTO
FROM BUILD_ROOM WHERE FINAL_GO_DATE IS NULL AND TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TRIP_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - INTERVAL '1' DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ROOM_DEL_DATE IS NULL )
ROOM_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{dto.room_title}||'%'
AND PLAN_ONOFF_NUM = #{dto.plan_onoff_num}
AND PW_CODE LIKE (CASE WHEN #{dto.room_onoff_name} IN ('YES', 'NO') THEN #{dto.room_onoff_name} ELSE '%' END)
AND GENDER_LIMIT_NUM = #{dto.gender_limit_num}
AND AGE_LIMIT_NUM = #{dto.age_limit_num}
AND REGION_NUM = #{dto.region_num}
AND BUDGET BETWEEN ${dto.budget_min} AND (CASE WHEN ${dto.budget_max} = 0 THEN 10000000 ELSE ${dto.budget_max} END)
AND TRIP_START_DATE = TO_DATE(#{dto.trip_start_date},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRIP_END_DATE = TO_DATE(#{dto.trip_end_date},'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY TOTAL DESC ) T WHERE RLV.ROOM_NUM = T.ROOM_NUM
ORDER BY RLV.TRIP_START_DATE
ORDER BY RLV.ROOM_BUILD_DATE DESC
